mapper.insert: insert into har_sqna (pno, mno, sno, title, secret) values (#{no}, #{writer.no}, #{serviceInfo.no}, #{title}, #{secret})
mapper.select: select q.pno, p.content, p.wdttm, p.view_cnt, p.pstat, q.mno, q.sno, q.title, q.secret, q.rpl_content, q.rpl_dttm, m.profile_pic, m.name, m.nickname, s.sname from har_sqna q inner join har_member m on m.mno=q.mno inner join har_post p on p.pno=q.pno inner join har_srpl_file f on f.fno=q.pno inner join har_service s on s.sno=q.sno where p.pstat=1

select q.pno, p.content, p.wdttm, p.view_cnt, p.pstat, q.mno, q.sno, q.title, q.secret, q.rpl_content, q.rpl_dttm, m.profile_pic, m.name, m.nickname, s.sname from har_sqna q inner join har_member m on m.mno=q.mno inner join har_post p on p.pno=q.pno inner join har_srpl_file f on f.fno=q.pno inner join har_service s on s.sno=q.sno where q.pno = #{no} p.pstat=1
